scripts.build: MODE=production yarn workspaces foreach -p -t run build
scripts.build:dev: MODE=development yarn workspaces foreach -t run build:dev
scripts.clean: yarn workspaces foreach -t run clean && rm -rf dist/*
scripts.version:bump: yarn version -i patch && node scripts/set_version.js "$(cat package.json | jq -r .version)" "$(yarn workspaces list --json)"
scripts.release: yarn clean && yarn version:bump && yarn build && yarn workspaces foreach -t run publish && ./scripts/publish_tiddlybase_public.sh
